Artifact of Chaos.name: Artifact of Chaos
Artifact of Chaos.description: Friendly fire is enabled for both survivors and monsters alike.

Artifact of Death.name: Artifact of Death
Artifact of Death.description: When one player dies, everyone dies. Enable only if you want to truly put your teamwork and individual skill to the ultimate test.

Artifact of Delusion.name: Artifact of Delusion
Artifact of Delusion.description: Risk your items after completing the Teleporter event in a test of memory to gain more items.

Artifact of Devotion.name: Artifact of Devotion
Artifact of Devotion.description: Replace broken drones with Lemurian Eggs. Give an item to hatch and gain a follower. All Lemurian followers receive item effect.

Artifact of Dissonance.name: Artifact of Dissonance
Artifact of Dissonance.description: Monsters can appear outside their usual environments.

Artifact of Enigma.name: Artifact of Enigma
Artifact of Enigma.description: Spawn with a random equipment that changes every time it's activated.

Artifact of Frailty.name: Artifact of Frailty
Artifact of Frailty.description: Fall damage is doubled and lethal.

Artifact of Glass.name: Artifact of Glass
Artifact of Glass.description: Allies deal 500% damage, but have 10% health.

Artifact of Honor.name: Artifact of Honor
Artifact of Honor.description: Enemies can only spawn as elites.

Artifact of Kin.name: Artifact of Kin
Artifact of Kin.description: Monsters will be of only one type per stage.

Artifact of Metamorphosis.name: Artifact of Metamorphosis
Artifact of Metamorphosis.description: Players always spawn as a random survivor.

Artifact of Prestige.name: Artifact of Prestige
Artifact of Prestige.description: At least one Shrine of the Mountain spawns every stage. Shrine of the Mountain effects are permanent.

Artifact of Rebirth.name: Artifact of Rebirth
Artifact of Rebirth.description: Descend to Petrichor V with a gift from a previous life.

Artifact of Sacrifice.name: Artifact of Sacrifice
Artifact of Sacrifice.description: Monsters drop items on death, but Chests no longer spawn.

Artifact of Spite.name: Artifact of Spite
Artifact of Spite.description: Enemies drop multiple exploding bombs on death.

Artifact of Swarms.name: Artifact of Swarms
Artifact of Swarms.description: Monster spawns are doubled, but monster maximum health is halved.

Artifact of Vengeance.name: Artifact of Vengeance
Artifact of Vengeance.description: Your relentless doppelganger will invade every 10 minutes.
